data.why:
Short term: script and set of modules implementing Perl/POD ->
    doxygen conversion.

    Long term: I have a backlog of other minor modules that might be
    worth contributing. I have not done so heretofore because (a) it's
    work to package and submit and (b) I figure everyone has this stuff
    already anyway. But that may change.

meta.subject: PAUSE ID request (RANXEROX; Marc M. Adkins)
